newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy March electricity demand down 0.5 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Italy March electricity demand down 0.5 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Italian electricity consumption fell a seasonally and calendar adjusted 0.5 percent in March compared to the same month last year, utility company Enel said on Thursday.
Enel said some 22.4 billion kWh of electricity was used last month. On an unadjusted basis, consumption fell 2.7 percent.
In the first two months of the year, electricity demand rose an adjusted 0.4 percent, Enel said. On an unadjusted basis, consumption fell 2.1 percent.
Electricity demand was boosted in March by the service and domestic sectors while consumption in the industrial sector fell, Enel said.
Net national production in March was 19.1 billion kWh, down 4.8 percent on the year.
